Kevin Durant

Kevin Wayne Durant ▪ Instagram: easymoneysniper

(Durantula, KD, Slim Reaper, Easy Money Sniper, The Servant, Green Room)

Position: Small Forward, Power Forward, and Shooting Guard ▪ Shoots: Right

6-11, 240lb (211cm, 108kg)

Team: Phoenix Suns

Born: September 29, 1988 in Washington, District of Columbia us

College: Texas

High Schools: National Christian Academy in Fort Washington, Maryland, Oak Hill Academy in Mouth of Wilson, Virginia, Montrose Christian School in Rockville, Maryland

Recruiting Rank: 2006 (2)

Draft: Seattle SuperSonics, 1st round (2nd pick, 2nd overall), 2007 NBA Draft

NBA Debut: October 31, 2007

Experience: 16 years

  • 15x All Star
  • 4x Scoring Champ
  • 2x NBA Champ
  • 11x All-NBA
  • 2007-08 All-Rookie
  • 2007-08 ROY
  • 2x AS MVP
  • 2013-14 MVP
  • 2x Finals MVP
  • NBA 75th Anniv. Team

Frequently Asked Questions

How old is Kevin Durant?

Kevin Durant is 36 years old.

Where was Kevin Durant born?

Kevin Durant was born in Washington, District of Columbia.

When was Kevin Durant born?

Kevin Durant was born on September 29, 1988.

How tall is Kevin Durant?

Kevin Durant is 6-11 (211 cm) tall.

How much does Kevin Durant weigh?

Kevin Durant weighs 240 lbs (108 kg).

Is Kevin Durant in the Hall of Fame?

Kevin Durant is not in the Hall of Fame.

When was Kevin Durant drafted?

Kevin Durant was drafted by Seattle SuperSonics, 1st round (2nd pick, 2nd overall), 2007 NBA Draft.

What position does Kevin Durant play?

Small Forward, Power Forward, and Shooting Guard.

What is Kevin Durant's net worth?

Kevin Durant has made at least $399,155,146 playing professional basketball.

How much does Kevin Durant make?

Kevin Durant made $47,649,433 in 2024.

What does Kevin Durant average?

Kevin Durant averages 27.3 points, 6.0 rebounds, and 4.2 assists per game.

How many rings does Kevin Durant have?

Kevin Durant has won 2 championships.

What is Kevin Durant's Twitter account?

Kevin Durant is on Twitter at KDTrey5.

What is Kevin Durant's Instagram account?

Kevin Durant is on Instagram at easymoneysniper.

What schools did Kevin Durant attend?

Kevin Durant attended National Christian Academy in Fort Washington, Maryland, Oak Hill Academy in Mouth of Wilson, Virginia, Montrose Christian School in Rockville, Maryland and Texas.

What are Kevin Durant's nicknames?

Durantula, KD, Slim Reaper, Easy Money Sniper, The Servant, Green Room are nicknames for Kevin Durant.
